price: بيا به موږ په خپله په كامل علم سره ټوله کیسه د هغوى مخې ته وړاندې كړو، او موږ چېرته غائب نه وو.
arabic: فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيۡهِم بِعِلۡمٖۖ وَمَا كُنَّا غَآئِبِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: falanaquṣṣanna ʿalayhim biʿil'min wamā kunnā ghāibīna
